item.title: SynthLight: Portrait Relighting with Diffusion Model by Learning to Re-render Synthetic Faces
item.description: SynthLight: A novel diffusion model relights portraits realistically by learning to re-render synthetic faces, generalizing remarkably well to real photographs.
